With this function you can define an area in room coordinates which will then clear the corresponding cells in the specified MP grid. Even if a cell partially falls within the defined rectangular region it will be cleared.
Index of the mp_grid that is to be used
The x coordinate of the left side of the rectangle to check.
The y coordinate of the top side of the rectangle to check.
The x coordinate of the right side of the rectangle to check.
The x coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangle to check.
The above code will mark as free all cells of the mp_grid indexed in the variable "grid" that fall within the area 0,0 to 100,200.
